# Saiprapul Thotapally — AI Product Leader

> Personal portfolio of Saiprapul Thotapally, a Technical AI Product Leader and Manager.

## About

Saiprapul Thotapally is an AI Product Leader at Global Payments and the Founder of Aero Intelligence. He specializes in building multi-agent systems, LangGraph orchestration, and enterprise AI strategy at scale. Based in Atlanta, GA.

## Current Roles

- **Technical Product Manager, AI at Global Payments** (2022–Present): Leading AI products for 6M+ merchants, 150K+ MAU, 10M+ queries/month. Built Genius AI platform, AI Translation ($11M value), and Agentic RAG (24K hrs/yr saved). Developed Complexity-Criticality Matrix for responsible AI governance.
- **Founder of Aero Intelligence** (2024–Present): Multi-agent voice AI for field workers (HVAC, construction, plumbing). 5-agent system using LangGraph and Claude API. 92.9% accuracy on Boeing R&D validation. 80% time reduction for field reporting.

## Key Expertise

- Multi-Agent Systems & LangGraph Orchestration
- Agentic RAG & LLM Fine-Tuning
- Enterprise AI Governance & Risk Frameworks
- Product Strategy, A/B Testing, KPI-driven Optimization
- User Discovery, GTM Strategy, Agile/Scrum

## Published Work

- [AI Evals Handbook](https://saiprapul.github.io/ai-evals-handbook/): Comprehensive guide to evaluating AI systems
- [How Transformers Think](https://saiprapul.github.io/transformer-viz/): Interactive walkthrough of transformer architecture
- [Complexity-Criticality Matrix for Enterprise GenAI Governance](https://www.irjet.net/archives/V11/i12/IRJET-V11I1293.pdf): IRJET 2024
- [Generative AI Unveiled: Mechanisms, Biases, and Ethical Engagement](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/387508601): ResearchGate 2024
